amendment.description: Amendment sought to retain FEMA as an independent agency with responsibility for natural disaster preparedness, response, and recovery.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 107-615 to retain FEMA as an independent agency with responsibility for natural disaster preparedness, response, and recovery.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 261 (Roll no. 353).
